message: All metadata fields for the indicator 1-3-3, translated into en
data: Goal 1. Eradicate poverty in all its forms and everywhere1.3 Put in place social protection systems and measures for all, adapted to the national context, including social protection floors, and ensure that, by 2030, a significant proportion of the poor and vulnerable people benefit from them1.3.3. Pension coverage rate (%)2020SEP / CNPSMUTUYEYEZU FrancineSDG focal point at SEP / CPNS79299237mutfrancy2013@yahoo.frNumber of the population receiving a pension in relation to the total population%SEP / CNPS, Report on the half-yearly reviewData are collected from survey reports and sectoral statistical yearbooksCollection takes place every six monthsEvery semesterSEP / CNPSSEP / CNPSState Institutions are members of the SSN whose mission is to collect, process and disseminate data from their sector.The indicator is relevant because it reflects the social security situationi.Updating the indicator requires exhaustive data collection in private health mutual fundsNumber of the population receiving a pension in relation to the total populationThe results of the data collection are validated at two levels: internal validation and validation at the CTIS level before publicationThe indicator is available at national level.The indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international levelHalf-yearly review report
